parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO clone_experts (project_id, analise_concorrentes, concorrentes_internacionais, concorrentes_brasileiros, sintese_estrategica, status, updated_at)
VALUES (
  '{{ $('ðŸ”„ Transform Expert Context').item.json.project_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ ($('5. Agent 5: Identity Mapper').item.json.text || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ ($('6A. Perplexity Internacional').item.json.choices[0].message.content || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ ($('6B. Perplexity Brasil').item.json.choices[0].message.content || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ ($('6C. Synthesis and Strategic Analysis').item.json.text || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  'ready',
  NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (project_id) DO UPDATE SET
  analise_concorrentes = EXCLUDED.analise_concorrentes,
  concorrentes_internacionais = EXCLUDED.concorrentes_internacionais,
  concorrentes_brasileiros = EXCLUDED.concorrentes_brasileiros,
  sintese_estrategica = EXCLUDED.sintese_estrategica,
  status = 'ready',
  updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING *;
